EmailTemplate.description: Includes link for Takeda Coaching Clinic PFQ (Bring Manual)
EmailTemplate.name: Takeda Coaching Clinic PFQ Reminder 1 (Bring Manual)
EmailTemplate.subject: [Reminder] ENSI Program Focus Questionnaire for {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} Coaching Clinic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ENS International Participant Email
M4NTRA Coaching Clinic â€“ Think & Act Differently to GET MORE
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please remember to complete your ENSI Pre-Program Questionnaire by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. The PFQ helps the Facilitators to focus the Clinic based on your negotiation.
Click here to access the questionnaire.*Please note that this link is specific to you, please don't forward it to others.
NB: If you have already started your questionnaire and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the questionnaire - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new questionnaire.
Remember to bring along your Green Negotiation and Influencing Manual.
Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_CSC_Title__c}
ENS International - Level 5, 83 York Street, Sydney 2000, NSW, Australia Phone: +61 2 9299 9688
